CustomBehavior.Text: Your character cannot fly in the current zone!\n\nThis profile is for people who can fly in Draenor only.

CustomBehavior.Code: Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.BlueViolet, "[Profile Notification]: Going to vendor and mail before we start farming.");

Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.FloralWhite, "[Profile Notification]: You cannot get some treasures in Gorgrond as they require you to have the Sparring Arena. Currently you have the Lumbermill which is located in Highpass. It allows you to harvest treasures covered in vines. It's not required, but if you wish to get every treasure you must pay 5,000 gold to change convert the Lumbermill into the Sparring Arena.");

Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.FloralWhite, "[Profile Notification]: You cannot get some treasures in Gorgrond as they require you to have the Lumbermill. Currently you have the Sparring Arena which is located in Highpass. It allows you to harvest treasures covered in vines. It's not required, but if you wish to get every treasure you must pay 5,000 gold to change convert the Sparring Arena into the Lumbermill.");

Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.Red, "[Profile Warning]: You do not have the Lumbermill or Sparring Arena in Gorgrond. You must do some quests to unlock either of these buildings. I highly reccomend running Kickz Gorgrond profile to unlock these buildings before continuing. If you do not you may not reach 200 Treasures.");

CustomBehavior.DestName: Remains of Explorer Engineer Toldirk Ashlamp

CustomBehavior.Name: Remains of Explorer Engineer Toldirk Ashlamp

CustomBehavior.GoalText: Waiting for Doomguard Overfiend to fly away.

(Object(84332, u => u.Location.Distance(new WoWPoint(-676.6944, 2429.01, 34.69685)) < 5) != null) || (Object(84342, o => o.Location.Distance(new WoWPoint(-676.6944, 2429.01, 34.69685)) < 5) != null)

(Object(84332, u => u.Location.Distance(new WoWPoint(-663.868, 2422.234, 33.40748)) < 5) != null) || (Object(84342, a => a.Location.Distance(new WoWPoint(-663.868, 2422.234, 33.40748)) < 5) != null) || (Object(233975, o => o.ToGameObject().State == WoWGameObjectState.Ready) != null)

CustomBehavior.Code: Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.BlueViolet, "[Profile Notification]: Treasure farming complete! Going to mail and vendor.");
